name: Orii Adrinova 24 Jar Revolving Spice Rack with Spices Included, Spice Organizer for Kitchen Countertop, Black & Green
short_description: 24 JAR SPICE RACK: This revolving spice rack organizer comes with 24 mason glass jars filled with spices, providing ample space to store and organize a wide range of spices, herbs, and seasonings. The jars are made of high-quality glass, which is durable, heat-resistant, and safe for storing spices.

REVOLVING TOWER DESIGN: The spice rack organizer features a revolving tower design, allowing you to easily access your spices without having to search through a cluttered cabinet. The tower rotates smoothly and effortlessly, making it convenient to find the spice you need quickly.

ELEGANT & STYLISH: The spice rack organizer is designed with an elegant and stylish appearance, which will add a touch of sophistication to any kitchen. The sleek and modern design is perfect for both contemporary and traditional settings.

FREE SPICE REFILLFOR 5 YEARS: Orii offers free spice refills for 5 years from the date of purchase. You pay only shipping and handling. This means that you can enjoy fresh spices without worrying about running out.

SPICES AND HERBS INCLUDED: Basil, Bay Leaves, Black Ground Pepper, Cayenne Pepper, Chives, Cilantro, Cinnamon Powder, Curry Powder, Garlic Powder, Ground Cumin, Ground Ginger, Italian Seasoning, Marjoram, Onion Powder, Onion Salt, Oregano, Paprika, Parsley, Red Pepper Flakes, Rosemary, Sage, Thyme, Turmeric, Yellow Mustard
